ygData.subject: INT vs memorizable spells
ygData.msgSnippet: About that ancient discussion with someone suggesting that INT should determine how many spells you could memorize.. (Sorry haven t read my email in a while
ygData.messageBody:
About that ancient discussion with someone suggesting that INT should
determine how many spells you could memorize.. (Sorry haven't read my
email in a while hehe;)
Anyways, I think it would be fair, almost, only for wizard classes and not
for the clerical classes which rely on WIS for mana and thus will spend
most of their bonus points on wisdom instead of INT.. Then again you could
have it being based on INT for wizard types and WIS for cleric types..
Only.. Poor damn rangers that are a mix of both.. hehe

- Avron Vallengard -
